title: Teen killed in shooting at Durham apartment complex
content:
DURHAM (WTVD) --
Durham police are investigating a fatal shooting at an apartment complex.
It happened in the 400-block of Pilot Street - off Fayetteville Street - just after 3 a.m. Tuesday morning.
Police said 17-year-old Demoraea Fennell was taken to Duke University Hospital where he died several hours later.
Anyone with information is asked to call Investigator E. Ortiz at (919) 560-4440, ext. 29337 or CrimeStoppers at (919) 683-1200. CrimeStoppers pays cash rewards for information leading to arrests in felony cases and callers never have to identify themselves.
